title: About
body: EASEOUT was launched in February 2020 by Tim Robards in Montreal, Canada. Weâ€™re blog inspired by the latest design trends and web development technologies. We provide creative inspiration, useful tutorials, articles and resources. The website runs on [](https://netlify.com)Netlify and is built with Vue.js. **FAQS:** **Q:** Can I advertise? \ **A:** Yes! Email hello@easeout.co **Q:** Can I submit my website? \ **A:** You sure can!
